category.name: Product Structure.PSE Behavior

preference.name: TC_BOM_Precision_Preference
preference.preference_description: Determines whether a new BOM view or BOM view revision should be precise or imprecise. The Add Design To Product wizard creates new occurrences based on this preference setting.This preference can be set in the Options dialog box of either the rich client or the thin client. You can also change this preference with the New BOM View Revision wizard. Valid Values: Precise - New BOM views and BOM view revisions are created precise. Imprecise - New BOM views and BOM view revisions are created imprecise.
